articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Huichon Ceramic Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Huichon Ceramic Factory
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Huichon Ceramic Factory.
					 He went round the factory to learn in detail about the introduction of new technology and production there.
					
					 After seeing various kinds of pottery produced by the factory, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the factory has sharply increased the production of pottery and markedly improved their quality in a matter of one year.
					
					Noting that the officials, technicians and workers of the factory have done a lot of work to consolidate the material and technical foundation of the factory, he highly appreciated their successes.
					
					He said that the shining successes registered by the factory are the precious fruition of the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude and they prove that reserves for boosting the production lie in making scientific and technological progress.
					
					 If one makes persevering efforts, giving priority to the development of science and technology just as the workers of the factory did, it is possible to successfully put the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis and make leaping progress in production, he said, stressing the need for all domains and units to thoroughly establish a production system based on a high level of science and technology.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the factory.
					
					 He called for boosting the production of useful and attractive pottery of various shapes and supplying them to people in plenty.
					
					In order to steadily increase the production of ceramics, it is necessary to continue dynamically pushing forward the scientification of the production processes, he noted, adding that to this end it is essential to steadily raise the level of technical skills of the workers and technicians and, at the same time, widely introduce advanced technology.
					
					The strong independent national economy in the DPRK has tremendous potential, he said, emphasizing that in order to give fullest play to this great production potential it is of particular importance to raise the level of guidance of the officials steering economy and, at the same time, increase the role of the scientists and technicians.
					
					 He called upon the officials and other working people of the factory to bring about a signal surge in production and thus make a positive contribution to improving the standard of people's living. 
					
					 The people of Jagang Province, the creators of the Kanggye spirit, have achieved, indeed, signal successes in this year, too, in hearty response to the Party's slogan "Glorify this year of the 60th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK as a year of historical turn which will go down in the history of the country!" he said, highly appreciating their feats. 
					
					Noting that the gigantic plan for building a great prosperous powerful nation has already begun to come true as a reality in the land of Jagang Province which has turned into a socialist land of bliss, he said that this astonishing miracle is the shining fruition of the inexhaustible mental power of the Korean people with which they flatten even thousands of high mountains at one go, if desired by the Party. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the party members and other working people in the province would creditably perform their role as vanguard and a shock force on all fronts of the socialist construction by displaying the same revolutionary spirit and mettle of fortitude as they did to successfully overcome the difficulties in the way of the revolution. 
					
					He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, department director of the C.C., WPK, Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang, first vice department directors of the same, and Korean People's Army Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Greetings to Peruvian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Peruvian Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to Peruvian Foreign Minister Jose Garcia Belaunde on Dec. 9 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Republic of Peru.
					 Saying that over the last two decades the two countries have boosted the ties of friendship and developed beneficial cooperation in different fields, the message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Termed Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The present chief executive and those concerned of the authorities in south Korea are vying with each other these days to assert that they would "settle all problems between the north and the south through dialogue on the basis of co-existence and co-prosperity" and "they are ready for dialogue". 
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland says in a statement issued on December 19 in this regard: 
					
					 A spate of remarks made by the Lee Myung Bak group about "dialogue", while pretending to be interested in the improved north-south relations are nothing but a deceptive artifice to evade their responsibility for having pushed the north-south relations that have favorably developed since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration to stalemate, get rid of their isolation at home and abroad caused by their hostile policy toward the DPRK and mislead the domestic and foreign public opinion.
					
					 The north-south dialogue should be conducted on the principle of wiping out mistrust and putting an end to the confrontation between the two sides and subordinating everything to national unity and reunification. Dialogue should not be misused as a platform for seeking a sinister political purpose, inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen and perpetuating the country's division.
					
					The south Korean conservative ruling forces, however, totally  negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, landmarks for reunification common to the nation, pursuant to such confrontational policy as "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" from the outset of their office, converting the north-south relations characterized by reconciliation, unity and reunification into those of antipathy and hostility through confrontation with the DPRK and war moves and thereby completely losing the qualification as a dialogue partner.
					
					 The Lee group have gone the lengths of openly crying out for "unification under the liberal democratic system" in a foolish bid to bring down the system in the DPRK while talking about "an emergency situation" and adopting "unification through absorption," a day-dream, and war of aggression against the DPRK as their "final goals". It is ridiculous for such guys to talk about north-south dialogue. This is, at the same time, an intolerable mockery and insult to the whole nation desirous of national unity and reunification.
					
					The south Korean authorities should apologize to the nation for having bedeviled the north-south relations and clarify their stand to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, to begin with before uttering any word about "dialogue".

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Organization
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Organization
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory in Russia.
					 It was handed to an official concerned by its Chairman Alexander Fedosov who is minister of Culture of the Khabarovsk Territorial Government on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket Saturday by the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who was related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "Greatest glory to Respected General
						Kim Jong Il!"

articles.title: Wreath Presented to Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreath Presented to Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A wreath was sent by the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who was related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, to be laid before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on the occasion of the 91st anniversary of her birth.
					 The wreath was placed before her bust Saturday.

articles.title: Significant Day of DPRK Celebrated by GFTUK and KDWU
articles.content:
Significant Day of DPRK Celebrated by GFTUK and KDWU
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Korean Democratic Women's Union held meetings on Dec. 18 and 19 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Reporters and speakers at the meetings noted that holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces made it possible to dynamically advance the Juche-oriented cause of army building and successfully carry forward the history and traditions of the Korean revolution started with arms and accomplish its cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has pursued unique Songun politics, consolidating as firm as a rock the military position of the country with the KPA as the core and brought about a shining victory and turn in the struggle to defend socialism and building a great prosperous powerful nation relying on the invincible military power, they said, and went on:
					
					 With his prominent military wisdom and commanding art he has developed the KPA into the army strong in idea and faith, achieved the unity of the army and people in thinking and work style and established the trait of assisting the army and helping the people throughout the country and thereby demonstrating the invincibility of the revolutionary army and reinforcing the army-people great unity, the roots of the society in the DPRK.
					
					 The undying exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by training the KPA into the first-line standard bearers and main force of the Juche-based revolution and winning one victory after another in the struggle to defend socialism and build a great prosperous powerful nation will shine forever in the history of the country.
					
					 Present at the meetings were Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Kim Jung Rin, officials of the working people's organizations and workers and members of the above-said unions.

articles.title: New Documentary Screened
articles.content:
New Documentary Screened
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Documentary film "Under the Guidance of the Great Brilliant Commander" (24) was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Dec. 20 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 The film deals with the facts that Kim Jong Il had the servicepersons, who dedicated their noble lives to the sacred struggle for the defence of the country and the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, remembered for all ages and glorified their life and merits.
					
					 It shows in historic scenes his boundless love for the revolutionary soldiers in uniforms who devoted their lives to faithfully carry out the cause of the leader and the Party with arms.
					
					 It also tells about the noble ideological and spiritual traits of the KPA servicepersons who have dedicated their all to the strengthening and development of the KPA and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Appreciating the film were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Agricultural Science and Technology Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Agricultural Science and Technology Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition and presentation of agricultural scientific and technological achievements was held here on Dec. 18 and 19.
					 The exhibition and presentation was divided into sections of crop-seed breeding, introduction of scientific farming, crops cultivation and farming machines, land and agricultural chemistry, fruits, vegetables, industrial crops, veterinary, stock raising and sericulture.
					
					 At least 130 papers on the scientific and technological achievements gained in the agricultural field were presented and over 260 pieces of new crop strains, botanical agrochemicals and farming machines of 129 kinds exhibited.
					
					 Introduced there were varieties of paddy rice with strong resistance to unfavorable conditions, varieties of bean able to be cultivated as first or second crop, varieties of potato suited for double-cropping in western coastal areas and other new strains of crops proper to geographical characteristics and the experience gained in cultivating them.
					
					 Also attracting the participants were the establishment of the general system for predicting crop growth, the method of scientific fertilizing with the main stress on organic fertilizer according to species of crops, the scientific method to protect apple trees from harmful insects, the method of creating grass fields in mountain slopes, veterinary medicines needed to prevent cow, sheep and goat from being infected with diseases and so forth.

articles.title: Youth Championship Held
articles.content:
Youth Championship Held
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A youth championship took place in Pyongyang, Hamhung, Wonsan, Sariwon and other places.
					 Its participants competed in football, basketball, volleyball and table tennis and other events.
					
					 The players of the April 25 Sports Group came first in the men's basketball event, women's volleyball event, men's table tennis team event, men and women's field hockey event, men's and women's boxing team events and women's weightlifting team event.
					
					 Men players of the Chobyong Sports Group and women players of the Rimyongsu Sports Group placed first in the football matches while women players of the Amnokgang Sports Group won the title of the basketball event. The first place in the weight lifting team event went to men players of the above-said group and that in the table tennis team event to women players of the Sobaeksu Sports Group.
					
					 Men players of the Central Physical Training College won the title of the volleyball event and men players of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Group and women players of the Haebangsan Sports Group that in the badminton team events. Men and women players of the Jangsan Sports Group emerged winners in short-track speed skating.

articles.title: Proud Successes Made in Sports Field
articles.content:
Proud Successes Made in Sports Field
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Athletes of the DPRK have adorned a brilliant page in the development of sports technique with many gold medals.
					 The 11th People's Sports Contest, the Sports Contests for Mangyongdae Cup, Paektusan Cup, Pochonbo Torch Prize and other sports tournaments were held successfully amid care of the government, displaying the validity and vitality of the policy of popularizing physical culture and making it their daily routine.
					
					 Athletes fully displayed their techniques at the contests. They broke the records of the DPRK in four events of weightlifting, swimming and field and track at the Sports Contest for Mangyongdae Cup and 18 events of shooting, archery, field and track, swimming and weightlifting at the 11th People's Sports Contest.
					
					 Ball game and technical skill events registered a splendid development, producing many gold medal winners.
					
					 Korean boys and girls achieved brilliant successes in international tournaments, too.
					
					 The women's football team won the title of the 2008 Asian Women's Football Championship held in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam in June following their wins at 2001 and 2003 championships and emerged victorious at the 1st FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup New Zealand 2008, thus promoting the national glory.
					
					 Pak Hyon Suk and Hong Un Jong bagged gold medals respectively in the 63kg category of the weightlifting competition and in the vaulting horse contest of women's gymnastics at the 29th Olympic Games held in China.
					
					 Korean athletes were honored with gold medals at the 8th World Youth and Children Taekwon-Do Championships, the 5th World Women's Boxing Championships, the 4th Asian Taekwon-Do Championships, the 1st International Boxing Federation President Cup Contest, the 11th Asian Marathon Championships and other international tournaments by applying Korean-style athletic principles and methods.
					
					 The laudable achievements made in the sports field this year are brilliant fruits borne by the firm will of athletes to demonstrate the dignity and stamina of Songun Korea to the whole world.

articles.title: More Works of Great Persons Displayed
articles.content:
More Works of Great Persons Displayed
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Over 2,000 more works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il have been displayed at the Exhibition of Works on the Juche Idea for the past decade after it was opened to public on Dec. 21, Juche 87 (1998).
					 Among them are more than one thousand works contained in such books as "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" and the "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" and collections of works "On the Revolutionary Traditions of Juche," "On the Juche Philosophy" and "On the Juche-oriented Literature and Art."
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored and published many works during the days when he pursued the unique Songun politics and led the struggle for defending socialism and building a great prosperous powerful nation to victory. More than one hundred works of them were displayed, including "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-victorious Banner of Our Revolution," "Let Us Discharge Our Duty as Citizens of the Republic with Civic Consciousness" and "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Line of Economic Construction in the Era of Songun Laid Down by the Party".
					
					 Out of works published by him in the period from January to July this year, about 20 works were brought out in booklet and displayed.
					
					 Among the works on display to enrich the treasure house of ideas and theories are several hundred works which were translated and published in pamphlet in many countries of the five continents.
					
					The exhibition has been visited by more than 2.3 million servicepersons and working people of different strata from over 26,000 organizations in the DPRK and a large number of overseas Koreans and foreigners over the past years.

articles.title: School Train of Love
articles.content:
School Train of Love
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The school train "Chongnyonjonwi" invariably runs on Pujon Pass in the northern part of Korea.
					 It was from May Juche 68 (1979) that the school train began to run to the foot of Mt. Paekam nearly 2,000 meters above the sea, crossing over Pujon Pass, high and steep.
					
					 The train has covered a distance of more than 155,000 kilometers till today.
					
					 The first commuter students were no more than eight. A school train for them came into being and a new railway station was built in a nameless mountainous village at the foot of Pujon Pass, producing a legend of love.
					
					 The students have realized their wish for learning to their hearts' content, attending school by the train.
					
					 The school train did not stop running even in the period of the "Arduous March" and the forced march.
					
					 The repair, general overhaul and normal operation of the passenger train and locomotive are done at the expense of the state.
					
					 Since its operation, more than 300 students have graduated from Paekam Middle School, attending school by the train.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Human Rights Abuses Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Human Rights Abuses Blasted
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet police authorities arrested Ri Sok Haeng, chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, on the charge of the violation of "the law on assembly and demonstration" for the mere reason that he participated in the massive struggle waged in protest against the import of American beef. In its wake the "Seoul district court" issued an arrest warrant for him. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: This is brutal suppression of the legitimate labor movement and a hideous human rights abuse as it trampled down upon even the elementary right to existence and democracy.  
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Cracking down upon the entirely just struggle of the KCTU, terming it "a violation of the law" and the like is nothing but an entirely unwarranted politically motivated suppression as it is a product of the fascist plot of the Lee Myung Bak group to destroy the KCTU at any cost under all sorts of pretexts, regarding it as a thorn in the flesh.
					
					 Lee and his cohorts have so far talked a lot about someone's "human right abuses." But do they have any qualification or face to dare talk about "human rights"?
					
					 It is preposterous, indeed, for them to use every opportunity to trumpet about "human rights" though they are harshly suppressing those workers who demand the guarantee of their right to existence, far from recognizing this most elementary human right. 
					
					 They are a group of the worst human rights abusers putting the successive dictators into the shade as they have not guaranteed even elementary right to existence and democratic freedom to the south Korean people but savagely suppressed them by violence. 
					
					 The group would be well advised to settle their human rights problem before pulling up others, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Nothing to Be Expected from Traitors
articles.content:
Nothing to Be Expected from Traitors
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- It is a taboo to have any illusion about the treacherous ruling quarters. This is a bitter lesson the south Korean people have drawn, reviewing the past one year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 What the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has done under the signboard of "pragmatism" is nothing but such acts of treachery as hurting the dignity and interests of the nation while kowtowing to foreign forces.
					
					 These crimes have driven the inter-Korean relations to the worst crisis and increased the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 What the Lee group has done against the nation, pursuing sycophancy and increasing the dependence upon foreign forces and stepping up the moves against reunification and escalating confrontation in utter disregard of the will and desire of the people is touching off unanimous denunciation among various circles in south Korea as it is absolutely unpardonable.
					
					 It is silly to pin any hope on this group of traitors who have adversely affected the independent development of the nation and the movement for the peaceful reunification of the country, swimming against the trend of the times.
					
					 It is only the strength of the Koreans and the concerted efforts of the fellow countrymen on which they can count. 
					
					 Ways of realizing the desire of the south Korean people to live and develop independently and the aspiration of all the fellow countrymen to enjoy peace and prosperity in the reunified country are clearly indicated in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 There is nothing to fear when all Koreans go united close under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Trade Union Leader on Hunger Strike in Prison
articles.content:
S. Korean Trade Union Leader on Hunger Strike in Prison
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Ri Sok Haeng, chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU), has been going on a hunger strike in prison for over ten days, according to KBS of south Korea on Dec. 18.
					 The KCTU announced that from Dec. 6 after he was arrested by the police he has staged the hunger strike in protest against the policy of destroying people's life pursued by the Lee Myung Bak "government" which incriminates the workers' struggle for the population's existence and tramples on the vital rights of part-time workers under the pretext of economic crisis.
					
					 Meanwhile, trade unions under the KCTU have waged the struggle outside the Chongwadae from Dec. 12 in demand of the release of Ri Sok Haeng and stop to suppression under the pretext of "security," KBS said.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Campaign Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Campaign Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- More than 200 political parties and organizations in south Korea, including the Democratic Labor Party, the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification, the Press Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Solidarity for Progress, called a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 16 to make public a declaration denouncing the puppet authorities for their unjust anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					 The declaration accused the south Korean authorities of taking the lead in "co-proposing" a "resolution on human rights issue in north Korea" in November.
					
					 The south Korean authorities impudently "co-proposed" the "resolution" though they are abusing the rights of the people out in the candlelight actions for their existence, the declaration said, and went on:
					
					 This fact makes one doubt about sincerity of the "resolution."
					
					 If the "resolution" is adopted, the inter-Korean relations will be further deteriorated and the realization of peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula will be delayed.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not confront with the north but opt for implementing the declarations for reunification of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Days Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Days Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Britain, Switzerland and Mongolia between Dec. 11 and 13 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were photos showing the immortal revolutionary exploits of three generals of Mt. Paektu and introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Chairman Harpal Brar and Vice-Chairman Ella Rule of the C.C., the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and Chairman Dermot Hudson of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said at a meeting that Kim Jong Suk, the incarnation of the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, reliably defended President Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life until the last moments of her life. She was an anti-Japanese war hero who devoted her all to the liberation of Korea, they stressed.
					
					 They also said that it is thanks to Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, that the DPRK could steadily advance the Songun revolutionary cause to victory.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said that Kim Jong Il's assumption of KPA supreme commandership was a historic landmark in the Songun revolution and an expression of all the Korean people's deep respect and trust in him.
					
					 D. Bilegt, general secretary of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, said that the kindergartens named after three generals of Mt. Paektu in Mongolia are a symbol of friendship between the two countries and that they would work hard for the development of the bilateral relations of friendship.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Switzerland
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for commemorating the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Bern on Dec. 13.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce the immortal feats and greatness of
						Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and hold colorful political and cultural events until April 15, 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Benemerito Estatal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Benemerito Estatal
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con la clase obrera de la provincia de Jagang la funcion artistica del Coro Benemerito Estatal.
					La disfrutaron tambien el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en dicha provincia, Pak To Chun, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y los funcionarios directivos de los organos a nivel provincial.
					
					Ese conjunto artistico laureado con la honorable "Orden Kim Il Sung" presento en la escena los coros "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il", "Cancion del EPC" y "Camino de la victoria", el solo masculino y coro "El deseo del soldado" y "Cancion de camaraderia" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes elogiaron en tono patetico las hazanas de direccion del Dirigente acumuladas para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y la construccion de una patria prospera levantando en alto la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) y mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo a la direccion del partido.
					
					Terminado el espectaculo, el Dirigente respondio cordialmente a la aclamacion de los ejecutantes y espectadores y felicito el exito de la funcion.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Coro Benemerito Estatal realizaron esta magnifica funcion perfecta en lo ideo-artistico, en que palpitan la conviccion y la voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, aprecio altamente el exito de la funcion y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Senalando que la clase obrera, creadora del espiritu de Kanggye, es la heroica que supero la severa coyuntura con su indoblegable espiritu revolucionario y ferrea voluntad levantando a lo mas alto la bandera roja de la revolucion en los periodos de "Marcha penosa" y la forzada, en que la patria atravesaba las pruebas mas dificiles, expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que ella seguira cumpliendo el papel de vanguardia en la ofensiva general para construir una gran potencia prospera con el espiritu e impetu desplegados en aquellos dias.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a su homologo peruano
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a su homologo peruano
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El canciller coreano, Pak Ui Chun, envio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo peruano, Jose Antonio Garcia Belaunde, en ocasion del 20o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica del Peru.
					 El remitente senala que a lo largo de estos 20 anos pasados, los dos paises han venido fortaleciendo los lazos de amistad  y desarrollando la cooperacion beneficiosa en varias esferas.
					
					 Expresa la conviccion de que el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliara y se fortalecera en lo adelante.

articles.title: CRPP refuta disparates de banda de Lee Myung Bak sobre "dialogo"
articles.content:
CRPP refuta disparates de banda de Lee Myung Bak sobre "dialogo"
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, el actual mandatario y otras autoridades del Sur de Corea dicen por turno que "solucionaran todos los problemas intercoreanos mediante las conversaciones y a base de la convivencia y coprosperidad" y "estan listos para dialogar".
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico la vispera una declaracion cuyo texto resumido sigue abajo:
					
					Si bien la banda de Lee sigue hablando del "dialogo" como si estuviera interesada en la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur, esto no pasa de ser una artimana enganosa para eludir su responsabilidad criminal por la situacion caotica de las relaciones Norte-Sur, que se desarrollaban favorablemente despues de la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, salir del aislamiento en que cayo en el ambito nacional e internacional por su politica de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e inducir en error la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					 El dialogo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea debe realizarse en el principio de eliminar la desconfianza y el enfrentamiento entre ambas partes y someter lo todo a la unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Nadie debe usar la mesa del dialogo para perseguir su malsano objetivo politico, causar el enfrentamiento fratricida y eternizar la division del pais.
					
					Pero, desde su primer dia en el "poder", las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas negaron y despreciaron totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de  Junio, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, jalon comun de reunificacion de la nacion coreana, en virtud de su politica conflictiva de "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares". Y perdio completamente la calificacion para dialogar al hacer regresar con las maniobras de enfrentamiento  y guerra contra la RPDC a la discordia y hostilidad las relaciones Norte-Sur, que tomaban el rumbo a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion.
					
					A partir de su absurda ilusion de atentar contra el regimen de la RPDC hablando atrevidamente de la supuesta "situacion bruscamente cambiada", la banda de Lee tuvo la osadia de definir como su "meta final" la "reunificacion por absorcion" y la guerra de agresion al Norte abogando abiertamente por la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal".
					
					Al hablar absurda e hipocritamente del "dialogo", esos compinches cometen una burla e insulto insoportables contra todos los coreanos aspirantes a la unidad y reunificacion nacionales.
					
					En vez de hablar del "dialogo", las autoridades surcoreanas deben pedir disculpas a la nacion por sus crimenes de haber roto las relaciones Norte-Sur y dejar en claro su posicion de ejecutar las declaraciones arriba mencionadas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia represion anti-DDHH en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia represion anti-DDHH en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, las autoridades policiales titeres del Sur de Corea arrestaron al presidente de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (CSS), Ri Sok Haeng, cuestionando su participacion en la lucha masiva contra la importacion de la carne de res norteamericana bajo la sospecha de violacion de la "ley sobre el mitin y la manifestacion".
					Seguidamente, el "Tribunal Local de Seul" le emitio la orden de encarcelamiento.
					
					En un comentario individual publicado el dia 20, el diario Rodong Sinmun califico ese hecho de represion brutal al legitimo movimiento obrero y de flagrante violacion de DDHH encaminada a suprimir el mas elemental derecho a la vida y la democracia.
					
					En particular, tal injusta represion politica lanzada contra la CSS criminalizando la muy justa lucha de esta por el supuesto cargo de "violacion de ley" parte del complot fascista de la banda de Lee Myung Bak, que trata de disolverla a toda costa considerandola como espina atravesada en la garganta.
					
					Si bien la banda de Lee hablaba mucho hasta ahora de "DDHH" de alguien, no tiene derecho ni cara siquiera para abordar este tema porque reprime salvajemente a los obreros, que demandan el derecho a la vida, el mas elemental DDHH, lejos de reconocerlo.
					
					La banda de Lee, que usando la violencia pisotea el derecho a la vida y la libertad democratica de los habitantes surcoreanos, es el colectivo de los peores violadores de DDHH que los anteriores dictadores.
					
					Seria mas conveniente a la banda de Lee resolver el problema de DDHH de casa que andar acusando a otros.
